definition: (of knowledge, skill etc) to be passed on from teachers to students, one generation to another, abbr. for 薪盡火傳|薪尽火传[xin1 jin4 huo3 chuan2]
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

definition: to pass on the light of Buddha

worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation

to review the old and know the new (idiom, from the Analects)/to recall the past to understand the future

to treat one another with absolute sincerity (idiom); to show total devotion
